thread.title: London Stock Exchange Group appoints Goldman's Schwimmer as CEO

title: London Stock Exchange Group appoints Goldman's Schwimmer as CEO
text:
April 13, 2018 / 6:28 AM / Updated 37 minutes ago London Stock Exchange Group appoints Goldman's Schwimmer as CEO Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
(Reuters) - London Stock Exchange Group Plc ( LSE.L ) said it appointed Goldman Sachsâ€™ ( GS.N ) David Schwimmer as chief executive officer effective Aug. 1. The London Stock Exchange Group offices are seen in the City of London, Britain, December 29, 2017. REUTERS/Toby Melville 
Schwimmer has been with Goldman for 20 years and most recently served as global head of market structure and global head of metals and mining in investment banking. 
Former LSE CEO Xavier Rolet stepped down last year just under a decade after he took charge and transformed the company with a string of deals. Reporting by Noor Zainab Hussain in Bengaluru; editing by Jason Neely
